result.execSummary:
The defendant Raul BUSTAMANTE-VILLAGOMEZ was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

No contact with the victim.

Provide a DNA sample and pay surcharge.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

timeConds.notes: On Count 1, under the Huber Law.

Order for Sentence Credit.
It is hereby ordered that the defendant is granted three (3) days of sentence credit and that the judgment of conviction is to be amended to reflect the sentence credit.

Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of 3rd degree sexual assault.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 09-14-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 cash with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and have no contact with A.A.S., DOB: 01-28-1991 or any premises she occupies, except for incidental contact at work.   Bail furnished and the defendant is released from custody. 
Minutes.
